title: Shark Bait
summaries: The Shark Bait is a Pet summon item that summons a pet Shark Pup. It can be found in Water Chests and Ocean/Seaside Crates.

When underwater, the shark pet swims around freely. When out of water, it is encased in a bubble. If you walk too far from the shark, it will not teleport. Instead, it will move swiftly toward the player.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a Shark Pup
'Doo, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo'
statistics.Sell: 1
